channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.20 (Build 20260204)
item.description:
What's New

feat: Clear history on Enter key in terminal apps

Add clearHistory() method to VNEngine to clear typing history

when Enter is pressed in terminal applications. This prevents

backspace from restoring words from previous command lines.

- VNEngine.swift: Add clearHistory() method

- KeyboardEventHandler.swift: Check isTerminal on Enter and clear history

- Version.xcconfig: Bump build version to 20260204

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
